TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutomationElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 UI 自动化树中的一个 UI 自动化元素，并包含由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序用作标识符的值。

span.span: Represents a UI Automation element in the UI Automation tree, and contains values used as identifiers by UI Automation client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于一种[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，则无论什么基础实现 (如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)])。An corresponds to a piece of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], regardless of underlying implementation (such as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]).

summary.span: 标识 属性，该属性用于标识元素。

span.span: Identifies the property, which is used to identify elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效标识符。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in . 此属性也可以检索从或属性。This property can also be retrieved from the or properties. 返回的属性的值的类型是。Return values of the property are of type . 该属性的默认值是空字符串。The default value for the property is an empty string. 当它可用时的元素应该始终具有与本地语言无关的应用程序的任何实例中相同。When it is available the of an element is expected to always be the same in any instance of the application regardless of the local language. 值应为唯一的而同级元素，但不是一定是唯一跨整个桌面。The value should be unique among sibling elements but not necessarily unique across the entire desktop. 例如，应用程序的多个实例或 Microsoft Windows 资源管理器中的多个文件夹视图可能包含具有相同的元素，如"SystemMenuBar"。For example, multiple instances of an application, or multiple folder views in Microsoft Windows Explorer, may contain elements with the same , such as "SystemMenuBar". 尽管支持始终在此属性不强制性更好的可测试性，建议。While support of an is always recommended for better testability, this property is not mandatory. 只要它受支持，创建测试自动化脚本，无论 UI 语言运行时很有用。Where it is supported, an is useful for creating test automation scripts that run regardless of UI language. 客户端应做任何假设有关s 公开的其他应用程序。Clients should make no assumptions regarding the s exposed by other applications. 不一定能保证跨不同的版本保持不变或生成的应用程序。An is not necessarily guaranteed to be stable across different releases or builds of an application. 实例[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素来唯一地标识通过桌面上其属性。Instances of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are uniquely identified on the desktop by their properties. > [!NOTE] > 控件视图中（除顶级应用程序窗口外）的所有 UI 自动化元素、派生自没有 ID 或 x:Uid 的 控件的 UI 自动化元素以及派生自没有控件 ID 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 控件的 UI 自动化元素都支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 。 is supported by all UI Automation elements in the control view except top-level application windows, UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] controls that do not have an ID or x:Uid, and UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] controls that do not have a control ID. ## Examples 下面的示例检索属性的当前值。The following example retrieves the current value of the property. 如果该元素未提供，则返回默认值。The default value is returned if the element does not provide one. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回集合的视图由的条件的处于活动状态时此获取对象。The view of the returned collection is determined by the condition of the that was active when this object was obtained. 仅当缓存子级的作用域包含， ，或。Children are cached only if the scope of the included , , or . 如果指定，子项已缓存在此级别，但没有子节点，则此属性的值为 0。If the specified that children were to be cached at this level, but there are no children, then the value of this property is 0. 但是，如果未请求缓存此级别的子级，尝试检索该属性将引发异常。However, if no request was made to cache children at this level, an attempt to retrieve the property raises an exception. ## Examples 在以下示例中，列表框元素从父窗口元素时获取处于活动状态并是。In the following example, a list box element is obtained from the parent window element while a is active and is . 子元素 （即，列表项） 的指定的属性存储在缓存中并且可以从检索的列表框。The specified properties of the child elements (that is, the list items) are stored in the cache and can be retrieved from the of the list box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较结果为相等的两个元素可能包含来自不同点在时间中的不同缓存的信息。Two elements that compare as equal may contain different cached information from different points in time. 相等性检查仅测试对象是否引用相同的基本用户界面元素; 也就是说，它们具有相同的运行时标识符。The equality check only tests that the objects refer to the same underlying user interface element; that is, that they have the same run-time identifier. 此方法相当于相等运算符，也比较运行时标识符。This method is equivalent to the equality operator, which also compare run-time identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索的作用域是相对于其调用该方法的元素。The scope of the search is relative to the element on which the method is called. 遇到在树中的顺序返回元素。Elements are returned in the order in which they were encountered in the tree. 在搜索时为顶级窗口在桌面上，请务必指定中`scope`，而不。When searching for top-level windows on the desktop, be sure to specify in `scope`, not . 桌面的整个子树搜索可能循环访问数千个项，并会导致堆栈溢出。A search through the entire subtree of the desktop could iterate through thousands of items and lead to a stack overflow. 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找的元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]单独线程上调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来查找所有已启用的按钮在窗口中的。The following example shows how to use to locate all enabled buttons in a window. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Point GetClickablePoint() cil managed

summary.span: 检索 上可以单击的点。

span.span: Retrieves a point on the that can be clicked.

returns.span: 一个点的物理屏幕坐标，客户端可以使用该点在此元素单击。

span.span: The physical screen coordinates of a point that can be used by a client to click on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不可点击如果完全遮盖另一个窗口。An is not clickable if it is completely obscured by another window. 是可单击时它满足以下所有条件：An is clickable when it satisfies all the following conditions: - 它是以编程方式可见和可用与[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树。It is programmatically visible and available with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. - 它完全滚动到视图在其父容器中，如果有的话。It is scrolled fully into view within its parent container, if any. 如果剪切元素，则无法保证它是可单击。If the element is clipped, there is no guarantee that it is clickable. - 该元素将不由任何其他 UI 元素被遮盖。The element is not obscured by any other UI element. 如果某些 UI 元素及其上级以外部分遮住元素，它可能不是可单击。If the element is partially obscured by some UI element other than its ancestors, it might not be clickable. - 必须可单击本身包含元素的窗口。The window containing the element must itself be clickable. 例如，如果包含窗口是完全透明，则不可单击该窗口。For example, the window is not clickable if the containing window is completely transparent. 鼠标单击会单击到下面的窗口，以便透明窗口内的任何控件不会返回可单击的点。Mouse clicks will click through to the window underneath, so any controls within the transparent window will not return clickable points. - 如果该元素为容器 （如列表或树视图），它必须具有一个点，当单击将导致控件获得焦点的背景。If the element is a container (such as list or tree view), it must have a point that when clicked will cause the background of the control to be focused. 如果容器控件的每个部分占用的子元素，它不是可单击。If every part of the container control is occupied by a child element, it is not clickable. 就不能保证控件将执行所有操作定义的点上单击时，可单击由 UI 自动化提供程序。There is no guarantee that a control will do anything when clicked on a point defined as clickable by the UI Automation provider. 请考虑改为使用控件模式来对控件执行操作。Consider using control patterns instead to perform actions on controls. ## Examples 以下代码检索控件的可单击的点，并将系统光标移动到该点。The following code retrieves a clickable point for a control and moves the system cursor to that point. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#179](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#179)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#179](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#179)]

span.span: There is no clickable point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效标识符。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in . 每当多个元素的可见性信息发生更改时，元素的容器被引发此事件。This event is raised by a container of elements whenever the visibility information of many elements has changed. 此事件由客户端用作一个指示器，它需要刷新和，它可能已缓存的树中的元素的信息。This event is used by the client as an indicator that it needs to refresh the and information that it may have cached for elements within the tree. 建议的更改数，将触发此事件为 25。The recommended number of changes that triggers this event is 25.
